title: Stu Forster
text: Stuart Thomas Forster (born 12 February 1969) is a former New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Scrum-half">halfback</a>, Forster represented <a href="Hawke%27s%20Bay%20Rugby%20Football%20Union">Hawke's Bay</a> and at a provincial level, and the <a href="Otago%20Highlanders">Otago Highlanders</a> in the first two years of <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a>. He was a member of the New Zealand national side, the <a href="All%20Blacks">All Blacks</a>, from 1993 to 1995, appearing in 12 matches including six internationals.
